verbs.description: " [ARG1: Our Southern Border] [V: is] [ARG2: under siege] , " President Trump tweeted early Monday morning , one day after U.S. Customs and Border Protection reported that 50,924 people were apprehended or deemed inadmissible at the Southwest border in April .
